mapper.select: SELECT A.id AS lineMaterialId, B.id AS materialId, B.material_code AS materialCode, B.name AS materialName, C.id AS lineId, C.line_name AS lineName, A.cycle_time AS cycleTime FROM line_material A JOIN material B ON B.id = A.material_id JOIN production_line C ON C.id = A.line_id WHERE C.status = 'PL_ACTIVE' ORDER BY B.material_code
